<p> Viewpoint provides a specific location and direction where the user may view the scene. Viewpoints are the primary way for a user to navigate within a scene, and for an author to show critical aspects of a model. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#Viewpoint" target="_blank">Viewpoint</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html" target="_blank">23 Navigation component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Concepts" target="_blank">23.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#OverviewOfNavigation" target="_blank">23.2.1 An overview of navigation</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Viewingmodel" target="_blank">23.2.3 Viewing model</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#ViewpointList" target="_blank">23.2.5 Viewpoint list</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#X3DViewpointNode" target="_blank">23.3.1 X3DViewpointNode</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Viewpoint" target="_blank">23.4.6 Viewpoint</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter26Viewpoint" target="_blank">Chapter 26 Viewpoint</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter04ViewingNavigation" target="_blank">Chapter 04 Viewing Navigation</a> </li> </ul>
